sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, A.BSN_PRSNM, A.BSN_PRSS_C, A.UP_BSN_PRSS_C, A.LV0_BSN_PRSS_C, A.LV1_BSN_PRSS_C, A.LV2_BSN_PRSS_C, A.LV3_BSN_PRSS_C, A.LV4_BSN_PRSS_C, A.LV0_BSN_PRSNM, A.LV1_BSN_PRSNM, A.LV2_BSN_PRSNM, A.LV3_BSN_PRSNM, A.LV4_BSN_PRSNM, A.LV0_ENG_BSN_PRSNM, A.LV1_ENG_BSN_PRSNM, A.LV2_ENG_BSN_PRSNM, A.LV3_ENG_BSN_PRSNM, A.LV4_ENG_BSN_PRSNM, LEVEL-1 AS "LEVEL", CASE WHEN C.BSN_PRSS_C IS NULL AND D.BSN_PRSS_C IS NULL AND E.BSN_PRSS_C IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END, A.VLD_YN, CONNECT_BY_ISLEAF AS LEAF FROM ( SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, CASE WHEN A.VLD_YN = 'Y' THEN A.BSN_PRSNM WHEN A.VLD_YN = 'N' THEN CONCAT('삭제)',A.BSN_PRSNM) END AS BSN_PRSNM, A.BSN_PRSS_C, A.UP_BSN_PRSS_C, A.LVL_NO, A.VLD_YN, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.BSN_PRSS_C, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,2) LV0_BSN_PRSS_C, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.BSN_PRSS_C, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,3) LV1_BSN_PRSS_C, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.BSN_PRSS_C, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,4) LV2_BSN_PRSS_C, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.BSN_PRSS_C, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,5) LV3_BSN_PRSS_C, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.BSN_PRSS_C, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,6) LV4_BSN_PRSS_C, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.BSN_PRSNM, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,2) LV0_BSN_PRSNM, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.BSN_PRSNM, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,3) LV1_BSN_PRSNM, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.BSN_PRSNM, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,4) LV2_BSN_PRSNM, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.BSN_PRSNM, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,5) LV3_BSN_PRSNM, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.BSN_PRSNM, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,6) LV4_BSN_PRSNM, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.ENG_BSN_PRSNM, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,2) LV0_ENG_BSN_PRSNM, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.ENG_BSN_PRSNM, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,3) LV1_ENG_BSN_PRSNM, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.ENG_BSN_PRSNM, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,4) LV2_ENG_BSN_PRSNM, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.ENG_BSN_PRSNM, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,5) LV3_ENG_BSN_PRSNM, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.ENG_BSN_PRSNM, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,6) LV4_ENG_BSN_PRSNM FROM (SELECT * FROM TB_OR_OC_PRSS WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) ) A START WITH A.UP_BSN_PRSS_C IS NULL CONNECT BY A.UP_BSN_PRSS_C = PRIOR A.BSN_PRSS_C ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, A.BSN_PRSS_C FROM TB_OR_RM_RKP A WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) GROUP BY A.GRP_ORG_C, A.BSN_PRSS_C ) C ON A.GRP_ORG_C = C.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LV4_BSN_PRSS_C = C.BSN_PRSS_C LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, A.BSN_PRSS_C FROM TB_OR_RM_RKP A ,TB_OR_RH_REL_LSS B WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) GROUP BY A.GRP_ORG_C, A.BSN_PRSS_C ) D ON A.GRP_ORG_C = D.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LV4_BSN_PRSS_C = D.BSN_PRSS_C LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, A.BSN_PRSS_C FROM TB_OR_RM_RKP A ,TB_OR_RH_REL_KRI B WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND A.OPRK_RKP_ID = B.OPRK_RKP_ID GROUP BY A.GRP_ORG_C, A.BSN_PRSS_C ) E ON A.GRP_ORG_C = D.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LV4_BSN_PRSS_C = D.BSN_PRSS_C START WITH A.UP_BSN_PRSS_C IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR A.BSN_PRSS_C = A.UP_BSN_PRSS_C ORDER SIBLINGS BY A.BSN_PRSS_C

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, A.HPN_TPNM, A.HPN_TPC, A.UP_HPN_TPC, A.LV0_HPN_TPC, A.LV1_HPN_TPC, A.LV2_HPN_TPC, A.LV3_HPN_TPC, A.LV0_HPN_TPNM, A.LV1_HPN_TPNM, A.LV2_HPN_TPNM, A.LV3_HPN_TPNM, TRIM(A.LV0_ENG_HPN_TPNM) LV0_ENG_HPN_TPNM, TRIM(A.LV1_ENG_HPN_TPNM) LV1_ENG_HPN_TPNM, TRIM(A.LV2_ENG_HPN_TPNM) LV2_ENG_HPN_TPNM, TRIM(A.LV3_ENG_HPN_TPNM) LV3_ENG_HPN_TPNM, LEVEL-1 AS "LEVEL", CASE WHEN B.HPN_TPC IS NULL AND C.HPN_TPC IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END UYN, HPN_TP_CNTN, ENG_HPN_TP_CNTN FROM ( SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, A.HPN_TPNM, A.HPN_TPC, A.UP_HPN_TPC, A.LVL_NO, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.HPN_TPC, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,2) LV0_HPN_TPC, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.HPN_TPC, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,3) LV1_HPN_TPC, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.HPN_TPC, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,4) LV2_HPN_TPC, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.HPN_TPC, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,5) LV3_HPN_TPC, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.HPN_TPNM, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,2) LV0_HPN_TPNM, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.HPN_TPNM, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,3) LV1_HPN_TPNM, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.HPN_TPNM, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,4) LV2_HPN_TPNM, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.HPN_TPNM, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,5) LV3_HPN_TPNM, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(NVL(A.ENG_HPN_TPNM,' '), ' >'),'[^>]+',1,2) LV0_ENG_HPN_TPNM, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(NVL(A.ENG_HPN_TPNM,' '), ' >'),'[^>]+',1,3) LV1_ENG_HPN_TPNM, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(NVL(A.ENG_HPN_TPNM,' '), ' >'),'[^>]+',1,4) LV2_ENG_HPN_TPNM, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(NVL(A.ENG_HPN_TPNM,' '), ' >'),'[^>]+',1,5) LV3_ENG_HPN_TPNM, A.HPN_TP_CNTN, A.ENG_HPN_TP_CNTN FROM (SELECT * FROM TB_OR_OC_HPN WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND VLD_YN = 'Y') A START WITH A.UP_HPN_TPC IS NULL CONNECT BY A.UP_HPN_TPC = PRIOR A.HPN_TPC ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, A.HPN_TPC FROM TB_OR_RM_RKP A WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND A.VLD_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY A.GRP_ORG_C, A.HPN_TPC ) B ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LV3_HPN_TPC = B.HPN_TPC LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, A.HPN_TPC FROM TB_OR_RM_RKP A WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND A.VLD_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY A.GRP_ORG_C, A.HPN_TPC ) C ON A.GRP_ORG_C = C.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LV3_HPN_TPC = C.HPN_TPC START WITH A.UP_HPN_TPC IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR A.HPN_TPC = A.UP_HPN_TPC ORDER SIBLINGS BY A.HPN_TPC

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: UPDATE TB_OR_OC_HPN SET HPN_TPNM = TRIM(#hpn_tpnm#) , ENG_HPN_TPNM = TRIM(#eng_hpn_tpnm#) , HPN_TP_CNTN = TRIM(#hpn_tp_cntn#) , ENG_HPN_TP_CNTN = TRIM(#eng_hpn_tp_cntn#) , LSCHG_DTM = SYSDATE , LS_WKR_ENO = TRIM(#userid#) WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND HPN_TPC = TRIM(#sel_hpn_tpc#)

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: SELECT CASE WHEN TRIM(#sel_level#) = 1 THEN TRIM(RPAD(TO_CHAR(NVL(TO_NUMBER(MAX(SUBSTR(HPN_TPC,1,2))),0)+1,'00'),7,'0')) WHEN TRIM(#sel_level#) = 2 THEN SUBSTR(TRIM(#sel_up_hpn_tpc#),1,2)||TRIM(RPAD(TO_CHAR(NVL(TO_NUMBER(MAX(SUBSTR(HPN_TPC,3,2))),0)+1,'00'),5,'0')) WHEN TRIM(#sel_level#) = 3 THEN SUBSTR(TRIM(#sel_up_hpn_tpc#),1,4)||TRIM(RPAD(TO_CHAR(NVL(TO_NUMBER(MAX(SUBSTR(HPN_TPC,5,2))),0)+1,'00'),3,'0')) END NEW_CODE FROM TB_OR_OC_HPN WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND UP_HPN_TPC = TRIM(#sel_up_hpn_tpc#)

AND VLD_YN = 'Y') A START WITH A.UP_CAS_TPC IS NULL CONNECT BY A.UP_CAS_TPC = PRIOR A.CAS_TPC ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, A.CAS_TPC FROM TB_OR_RM_RKP A WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND A.VLD_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY A.GRP_ORG_C, A.CAS_TPC ) B ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LV3_CAS_TPC = B.CAS_TPC LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, A.CAS_TPC FROM TB_OR_RM_RKP A sql.data: SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C , A.BRC , A.BRNM , LEVEL , A.UP_BRC , (SELECT BRNM FROM TB_OR_OM_ORGZ WHERE GRP_ORG_C = A.GRP_ORG_C AND BRC = A.UP_BRC) AS UP_BRNM , A.BR_LKO_YN , A.RGN_C , B.INTG_IDVD_CNM AS RGN_NM , A.HURSAL_BR_FORM_C , C.INTG_IDVD_CNM AS HURSAL_BR_FORM_NM , A.HOFC_BIZO_DSC , D.INTG_IDVD_CNM AS HOFC_BIZO_DSNM , A.ORGZ_CFC , E.INTG_IDVD_CNM AS ORGZ_CFNM , A.UYN , A.LWST_ORGZ_YN , A.RCSA_ORGZ_YN , A.KRI_ORGZ_YN , A.LSS_ORGZ_YN , A.TEMGR_DCZ_YN , CASE WHEN F.BRC IS NULL AND G.BRC IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END BSN_UYN FROM (SELECT * FROM TB_OR_OM_ORGZ WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#)) A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_CODE B ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C AND A.RGN_C = B.IDVDC_VAL AND B.INTG_GRP_C = 'RGN_C' AND B.C_UYN = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_CODE C ON A.GRP_ORG_C = C.GRP_ORG_C AND A.HURSAL_BR_FORM_C = C.IDVDC_VAL AND C.INTG_GRP_C = 'HURSAL_BR_FORM_C' AND C.C_UYN = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_CODE D ON A.GRP_ORG_C = D.GRP_ORG_C AND A.HOFC_BIZO_DSC = D.IDVDC_VAL AND D.INTG_GRP_C = 'HOFC_BIZO_DSC' AND D.C_UYN = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_CODE E ON A.GRP_ORG_C = E.GRP_ORG_C AND A.ORGZ_CFC = E.IDVDC_VAL AND E.INTG_GRP_C = 'ORGZ_CFC' AND E.C_UYN = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, B.BRC FROM TB_OR_OC_PRSS A INNER JOIN TB_OR_OH_PRSS_UGBR B ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C AND A.BSN_PRSS_C = B.BSN_PRSS_C WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND A.VLD_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY A.GRP_ORG_C, B.BRC ) F ON A.GRP_ORG_C = F.GRP_ORG_C AND A.BRC = F.BRC LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, B.BRC FROM TB_OR_KM_RKI A INNER JOIN TB_OR_KH_BRC B ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C AND A.OPRK_RKI_ID = B.OPRK_RKI_ID WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND A.VLD_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY A.GRP_ORG_C, B.BRC ) G ON A.GRP_ORG_C = G.GRP_ORG_C AND A.BRC = G.BRC START WITH A.HOFC_BIZO_DSC = '01' CONNECT BY PRIOR A.BRC = A.UP_BRC

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: SELECT A.BRC, B.BRNM AS BRNM_T, E.BRNM, A.OPTR_ENO, C.CHRG_EMPNM OPTR_ENM, A.MENU_ID, D.PAGE_MNNM MNNM, F.INTG_IDVD_CNM AS PZCNM, A.SVCID, CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.SVCID,-2,1)='S' THEN '조회' WHEN SUBSTR(A.SVCID,-2,1)='I' THEN '등록' WHEN SUBSTR(A.SVCID,-2,1)='D' THEN '삭제' WHEN SUBSTR(A.SVCID,-2,1)='U' THEN '수정' END SVCDS, A.IPADR, TO_CHAR(A.OPR_DTM,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') OPR_DTM FROM TB_OR_OM_ONL_TRLOG A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ B ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C AND A.BRC = B.BRC LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_EMP C ON A.GRP_ORG_C = C.GRP_ORG_C AND A.OPTR_ENO = C.ENO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_MENU D ON A.GRP_ORG_C = D.GRP_ORG_C AND A.MENU_ID = D.MENU_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ E ON A.GRP_ORG_C = E.GRP_ORG_C AND TRIM(B.UP_BRC) = E.BRC LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_CODE F ON A.GRP_ORG_C = F.GRP_ORG_C AND F.INTG_GRP_C = 'PZCC' AND C.PZCC = F.IDVDC_VAL WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = #grp_org_c#

sql.name: SQL12
sql.data: AND TO_CHAR(A.OPR_DTM,'YYYYMMDD') >= #sch_st_dt#

sql.name: SQL13
sql.data: AND TO_CHAR(A.OPR_DTM,'YYYYMMDD') <= #sch_ed_dt#

sql.name: SQL14
sql.data: AND A.BRC = TRIM(#sch_brc#)

sql.name: SQL15
sql.data: AND UPPER(C.CHRG_EMPNM) LIKE '%%'||UPPER(TRIM(#sch_usernm#))||'%%'

sql.name: SQL17
sql.data: AND UPPER(A.MENU_ID) LIKE '%%'||UPPER(TRIM(#sch_menu_id#))||'%%'

sql.name: SQL16
sql.data: AND UPPER(D.PAGE_MNNM) LIKE '%%'||UPPER(TRIM(#sch_mnnm#))||'%%'

sql.name: SQL17
sql.data: ORDER BY A.OPR_DTM DESC

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: SELECT A.BLBD_DSC, A.BLBD_SQNO, A.BLBD_TINM, A.BLBD_INQ_CN, A.BBRD_RGMN_ENO, B.CHRG_EMPNM BBRD_RGMN_ENM, A.BLBD_RG_BRC, C.BRNM BLBD_RG_BRNM, A.BBRD_RG_DT FROM TB_OR_OM_BLBD A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_EMP B ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C AND A.BBRD_RGMN_ENO = B.ENO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ C ON A.GRP_ORG_C = C.GRP_ORG_C AND A.BLBD_RG_BRC = C.BRC WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = #grp_org_c# AND A.BLBD_DSC = #blbd_dsc#

sql.name: SQL12
sql.data: AND A.BBRD_RG_DT >= #sch_st_dt#

sql.name: SQL13
sql.data: AND A.BBRD_RG_DT <= #sch_ed_dt#

sql.name: SQL15
sql.data: AND A.BLBD_TINM LIKE '%%' || TRIM(#sch_tinm#) || '%%'

sql.name: SQL16
sql.data: AND B.CHRG_EMPNM LIKE '%%' || TRIM(#sch_enm#) || '%%'

sql.name: SQL14
sql.data: ORDER BY A.BLBD_SQNO DESC

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: DELETE FROM TB_OR_OM_BLBD WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND BLBD_DSC = TRIM(#blbd_dsc#) AND BLBD_SQNO = TRIM(#blbd_sqno#)

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: SELECT A.BLBD_DSC, A.BLBD_SQNO, A.BLBD_TINM, A.BLBD_CNTN , A.BBRD_RG_DT , CASE WHEN A.BLBD_DSC = '1' THEN '관리자' ELSE B.CHRG_EMPNM||'('||A.BBRD_RGMN_ENO||')' END CHRG_EMPNM , A.BBRD_RGMN_ENO, C.BRNM , A.PUP_YN , A.BLTN_ST_DT , A.BLTN_ED_DT FROM TB_OR_OM_BLBD A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_EMP B ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C AND A.BBRD_RGMN_ENO = B.ENO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ C ON A.GRP_ORG_C = C.GRP_ORG_C AND A.BLBD_RG_BRC = C.BRC WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND A.BLBD_DSC = TRIM(#blbd_dsc#) AND A.BLBD_SQNO = TRIM(#blbd_sqno#)

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: UPDATE TB_OR_OM_BLBD SET BLBD_TINM = TRIM(#blbd_tinm#), BLBD_CNTN = TRIM(#blbd_cntn#), PUP_YN = TRIM(#pup_yn#), BLTN_ST_DT = TRIM(#bltn_st_dt#), BLTN_ED_DT = TRIM(#bltn_ed_dt#), LSCHG_DTM = SYSDATE, LS_WKR_ENO = TRIM(#userid#) WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND BLBD_DSC = TRIM(#blbd_dsc#) AND BLBD_SQNO = TRIM(#blbd_sqno#)

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: SELECT NVL(MAX(BLBD_SQNO),0)+1 BLBD_SQNO FROM TB_OR_OM_BLBD WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND BLBD_DSC = TRIM(#blbd_dsc#)

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: INSERT INTO TB_OR_OM_BLBD ( GRP_ORG_C, BLBD_DSC, BLBD_SQNO, BLBD_TINM, BLBD_CNTN, BBRD_RGMN_ENO, BLBD_RG_BRC, BBRD_RG_DT, BLTN_ST_DT, BLTN_ED_DT, PUP_YN, FIR_INP_DTM, FIR_INPMN_ENO, LSCHG_DTM, LS_WKR_ENO) VALUES ( TRIM(#grp_org_c#), TRIM(#blbd_dsc#), (SELECT NVL(MAX(BLBD_SQNO),0)+1 BLBD_SQNO FROM TB_OR_OM_BLBD WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND BLBD_DSC = TRIM(#blbd_dsc#) ), TRIM(#blbd_tinm#), TRIM(#blbd_cntn#), TRIM(#userid#), TRIM(#brc#), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), TRIM(#bltn_st_dt#), TRIM(#bltn_ed_dt#), TRIM(#pup_yn#), SYSDATE, TRIM(#userid#), SYSDATE, TRIM(#userid#))

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: DELETE FROM TB_OR_OM_BLBD WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND BLBD_DSC = TRIM(#blbd_dsc#) AND BLBD_SQNO = TRIM(#blbd_sqno#)

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: SELECT AUTH_GRP_ID, AUTH_GRPNM AUTH_GRP_ID_NM FROM TB_OR_OM_AUTH WHERE GRP_ORG_C = #grp_org_c# AND VLD_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY AUTH_GRP_ID

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: SELECT A.BRNM, A.PZCC, A.PZCNM, A.OFT_C, A.OFT, A.ENO, A.EMPNM, CASE WHEN B.AUTH_GRPNM IS NULL THEN CASE WHEN C.AUTH_GRPNM IS NULL THEN '' ELSE C.AUTH_GRPNM END ELSE CASE WHEN C.AUTH_GRPNM IS NULL THEN B.AUTH_GRPNM ELSE B.AUTH_GRPNM||', '||C.AUTH_GRPNM END END AUTH_NM, A.TEL_NO, TO_CHAR(A.LS_CONN_DTM,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') LS_CONN_DTM, A.BRC, A.TMS_BRC, A.TMS_BRNM FROM ( SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, B.BRNM, A.PZCC, D1.INTG_IDVD_CNM PZCNM, A.OFT_C, D2.INTG_IDVD_CNM OFT, A.ENO, A.CHRG_EMPNM EMPNM, B.BRC, A.OFFC_TEL_CNTN TEL_NO, A.LS_CONN_DTM , A.TMS_BRC, C.BRNM TMS_BRNM FROM TB_OR_OM_EMP A INNER JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ B ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C AND A.BRC = B.BRC LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ C ON A.GRP_ORG_C = C.GRP_ORG_C AND A.TMS_BRC = C.BRC LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_CODE D1 ON A.GRP_ORG_C = D1.GRP_ORG_C AND A.PZCC = D1.IDVDC_VAL AND D1.INTG_GRP_C = 'PZCC' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_CODE D2 ON A.GRP_ORG_C = D2.GRP_ORG_C AND A.OFT_C = D2.IDVDC_VAL AND D2.INTG_GRP_C = 'OFT_C' WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND A.HDOF_RTR_DSC <> '2'

sql.name: SQL12
sql.data: AND B.BRC = TRIM(#sch_brc#)

sql.name: SQL13
sql.data: AND UPPER(A.CHRG_EMPNM) LIKE '%%'||UPPER(TRIM(#empnm#))||'%%'

sql.name: SQL14
sql.data: ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, A.ENO, A.BRC, LISTAGG(A.AUTH_GRP_ID,'|') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY A.AUTH_GRP_ID) AUTH_GRP_ID, LISTAGG(B.AUTH_GRPNM,', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY A.AUTH_GRP_ID) AUTH_GRPNM FROM TB_OR_OH_ORGZ_EMP_AUTH A INNER JOIN TB_OR_OM_AUTH B ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C AND A.AUTH_GRP_ID = B.AUTH_GRP_ID WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND A.AUTH_GRP_ID <> '008' AND A.BRC <> (SELECT BRC FROM TB_OR_OM_ORGZ WHERE GRP_ORG_C=TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND HOFC_BIZO_DSC='01' AND UYN='Y') GROUP BY A.GRP_ORG_C, A.ENO, A.BRC ) B /* 부서 권한 */ ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C AND A.ENO = B.ENO AND A.BRC = B.BRC LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, A.ENO, A.BRC, LISTAGG(A.AUTH_GRP_ID,'|') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY A.AUTH_GRP_ID) AUTH_GRP_ID, LISTAGG(B.AUTH_GRPNM,', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY A.AUTH_GRP_ID) AUTH_GRPNM FROM TB_OR_OH_ORGZ_EMP_AUTH A INNER JOIN TB_OR_OM_AUTH B ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C AND A.AUTH_GRP_ID = B.AUTH_GRP_ID WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND A.BRC = (SELECT BRC FROM TB_OR_OM_ORGZ WHERE GRP_ORG_C=TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND HOFC_BIZO_DSC='01' AND UYN='Y') GROUP BY A.GRP_ORG_C, A.ENO, A.BRC ) C /* 전사 권한 */ ON A.GRP_ORG_C = C.GRP_ORG_C AND A.ENO = C.ENO

sql.name: SQL15
sql.data: WHERE (B.AUTH_GRP_ID LIKE '%%'||TRIM(#auth_grp_id#)||'%%' OR C.AUTH_GRP_ID LIKE '%%'||TRIM(#auth_grp_id#)||'%%')

sql.name: SQL13
sql.data: ORDER BY A.BRC, NVL(A.PZCC, 'XX'), A.ENO

sql.name: SQL01

sql.data: SELECT NVL(IDVDC_VAL,' ') INTGC, NVL(INTG_IDVD_CNM,' ') INTG_CNM FROM TB_OR_OM_CODE WHERE GRP_ORG_C = #grp_org_c# AND INTG_GRP_C = #intg_grp_c# AND C_UYN = 'Y' ORDER BY SORT_SQ

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, A1.GRP_ORGNM GRP_ORG_NM, A.GRP_BAT_PGID BAT_PGID, B.BTWKNM, TO_CHAR(A.BTWK_ST_DTM,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') BTWK_ST_DTM, TO_CHAR(A.BTWK_ED_DTM,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') BTWK_ED_DTM, TRUNC(A.BTWK_ED_DTM - A.BTWK_ST_DTM)||'일'|| TRUNC(MOD((A.BTWK_ED_DTM - A.BTWK_ST_DTM),1)*24)||'시'|| TRUNC(MOD((A.BTWK_ED_DTM - A.BTWK_ST_DTM)*24,1)*60)||'분'|| TRUNC(ROUND(MOD((A.BTWK_ED_DTM - A.BTWK_ST_DTM)*24*60,1)*60))||'초' RQRDTIME, CASE WHEN E.BTWK_ID IS NULL THEN '자동' ELSE '수동' END PRCSDS, A.BTWK_ALL_PRC_CN, A.BTWK_ERR_CN, A.BTWK_NMLPRC_CN, A.BTWK_STSC, D.INTG_IDVD_CNM FROM TB_OR_OM_BAT_JOB_STAT A INNER JOIN TB_OR_OM_GRPORG A1 ON A.GRP_ORG_C = A1.GRP_ORG_C LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_BTWK_SCHD B ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C AND A.GRP_BAT_PGID = B.BTWK_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_CODE D ON A.GRP_ORG_C = D.GRP_ORG_C AND A.BTWK_STSC = D.IDVDC_VAL AND D.INTG_GRP_C = 'BTWK_STSC' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_BAT_REWRK E ON A.GRP_ORG_C = E.GRP_ORG_C AND A.GRP_BAT_PGID = E.BTWK_ID AND A.BTWK_ST_DTM = E.BTWK_ST_DTM WHERE 1 = 1

sql.name: SQL12
sql.data: AND A.BTWK_ST_DTM >= TO_DATE(TRIM(#sch_st_dt#),'yyyy-MM-dd')

sql.name: SQL13
sql.data: AND A.BTWK_ST_DTM < TO_DATE(TRIM(#sch_ed_dt#),'yyyy-MM-dd')+1

sql.name: SQL14
sql.data: AND A.BTWK_STSC = TRIM(#sch_btwk_stsc#)

sql.name: SQL15
sql.data: AND UPPER(B.BTWKNM) LIKE '%%'||UPPER(TRIM(#sch_btwknm#))||'%%'

sql.name: SQL16
sql.data: AND UPPER(A.GRP_BAT_PGID) LIKE '%%'||UPPER(TRIM(#sch_btwk_id#))||'%%'

sql.name: SQL17
sql.data: AND B.BTWK_EXE_FQ_DSC = TRIM(#sch_btwk_exe_fq_dsc#)

sql.name: SQL17
sql.data: AND A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#sch_grp_org_c#)

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: SELECT GRP_ORG_C , PRC_DT , GRP_BAT_PGID , BAT_LOG_SQNO , BTWK_BAS_DT , BTWK_BAS_YM , BTWK_DSC , BTWK_TBLNM , LOG_FLNM , BAT_LOG_CNTN , TO_CHAR(LOG_DTM,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS LOG_DTM FROM TB_OR_OM_BAT_LOG WHERE GRP_ORG_C = #sch_grp_org_c# AND GRP_BAT_PGID = TRIM(#grp_bat_pgid#) AND PRC_DT = SUBSTR(#prc_dtm#,1,8) AND PRC_DTM = #prc_dtm# ORDER BY GRP_ORG_C, PRC_DT, GRP_BAT_PGID, BAT_LOG_SQNO

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: SELECT NVL(IDVDC_VAL,' ') INTGC, NVL(INTG_IDVD_CNM,' ') INTG_CNM FROM TB_OR_OM_CODE WHERE GRP_ORG_C = #grp_org_c# AND INTG_GRP_C = #intg_grp_c# AND C_UYN = 'Y' ORDER BY SORT_SQ

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: SELECT /*+ USE_HASH(AA, BB) */ NVL(AA.GRP_ORG_C, '') GRP_ORG_C , NVL(DD.GRP_ORGNM, '') GRP_ORGNM , NVL(AA.BTWK_ID, '') BTWK_ID , NVL(BB.BAT_SQNO, 0) BAT_SQNO , NVL(AA.BTWKNM, '') BTWKNM , NVL(TO_CHAR(BB.BTWK_ST_DTM,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), '') BTWK_ST_DTM , NVL(TO_CHAR(BB.BTWK_ED_DTM,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), '') BTWK_ED_DTM , NVL(AA.BTWK_RZT_C, 0) BTWK_RZT_C , BTWK_TBLNM,BTWK_STSC, BTWK_ALL_PRC_CN , BTWK_ERR_CN, BTWK_NMLPRC_CN , NVL(BTWK_STSC_NM,'미실행') BTWK_STSC_NM , BTWK_BASDT_DSC , #sch_inq_bas_dt# BTWK_BAS_DT --, BB.BTWK_BAS_DT , BTWK_EXE_FQ_DSC , CASE WHEN NVL(CC.WK_REL_BTWKCN,0) = '0' THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END WK_REL_BTWKCN , BTWK_LOG_PATHNM , DECODE (TRIM (AA.BTWK_BAS_YM), '0', AA.BTWK_BAS_DT, BTWK_BAS_YM) , BTWK_ST_DT FROM TB_OR_OM_BTWK_SCHD AA , ( SELECT EE.GRP_ORG_C , EE.GRP_BAT_PGID , EE.BAT_SQNO , EE.BTWK_ST_DTM , EE.BTWK_ED_DTM , BTWK_TBLNM,BTWK_STSC, BTWK_ALL_PRC_CN , BTWK_ERR_CN, BTWK_NMLPRC_CN , DECODE(BTWK_STSC, 'S','수행중','F','종료','E','에러','') BTWK_STSC_NM , DECODE (BTWK_BAS_DT, NULL, BTWK_YM, BTWK_BAS_DT) BTWK_BAS_DT FROM TB_OR_OM_BAT_JOB_STAT EE , (

sql.name: SQL12
sql.data: SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C , A.GRP_BAT_PGID , MAX(A.BAT_SQNO) AS BAT_SQNO FROM TB_OR_OM_BAT_JOB_STAT A , TB_OR_OM_BTWK_SCHD B WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C AND A.GRP_BAT_PGID = B.BTWK_ID AND CASE WHEN B.BTWK_BAS_DT = B.BTWK_ST_DT THEN TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.BTWK_BAS_DT ,'YYYYMMDD')-1,'YYYYMMDD') ELSE A.BTWK_BAS_DT END = TRIM(#sch_inq_bas_dt#) GROUP BY A.GRP_ORG_C, A.GRP_BAT_PGID

sql.name: SQL13
sql.data: SELECT GRP_ORG_C, GRP_BAT_PGID, MAX(BAT_SQNO) AS BAT_SQNO FROM TB_OR_OM_BAT_JOB_STAT WHERE BTWK_YM = SUBSTR(#sch_inq_bas_dt#, 0, 6) GROUP BY GRP_ORG_C, GRP_BAT_PGID

sql.name: SQL174
sql.data: SELECT GRP_ORG_C, GRP_BAT_PGID, MAX(BAT_SQNO) AS BAT_SQNO FROM TB_OR_OM_BAT_JOB_STAT WHERE BTWK_YM = SUBSTR(#sch_inq_bas_dt#, 0, 6) GROUP BY GRP_ORG_C, GRP_BAT_PGID

sql.name: SQL15

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data:
SELECT A1.GRP_ORG_C , A1.ENO , A1.BRC , A.CHRG_EMPNM EMPNM , CO01.INTG_IDVD_CNM PZCNM , B.BRNM , CASE WHEN D001.AUTH_GRP_ID = '001' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AUTH_001 /* 시스템관리자 */ , CASE WHEN D002.AUTH_GRP_ID = '002' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AUTH_002 /* ORM전담 */ , CASE WHEN D003.AUTH_GRP_ID = '003' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AUTH_003 /* 부서ORM업무담당자 */ , CASE WHEN D004.AUTH_GRP_ID = '004' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AUTH_004 /* 본부부서 팀장 */ , CASE WHEN D005.AUTH_GRP_ID = '005' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AUTH_005 /* 본부부서 부장 */ , CASE WHEN D006.AUTH_GRP_ID = '006' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AUTH_006 /* 지점장(영업점) */ , CASE WHEN D008.AUTH_GRP_ID = '008' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AUTH_008 /* 일반사용자 */ , CASE WHEN D009.AUTH_GRP_ID = '009' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AUTH_009 /* ORM팀장 */ , CASE WHEN D010.AUTH_GRP_ID = '010' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AUTH_010 /* BCP 관리부서 담당자 */ FROM TB_OR_OH_ORGZ_EMP A1 LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_EMP A ON A1.GRP_ORG_C = A.GRP_ORG_C AND A1.ENO = A.ENO INNER JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ B ON A1.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C AND A1.BRC = B.BRC INNER JOIN TB_OR_OH_ORGZ_EMP C /* 부서용 권한 조인 테이블 */ ON A1.GRP_ORG_C = C.GRP_ORG_C AND A1.ENO = C.ENO AND A1.BRC = C.BRC LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OH_ORGZ_EMP D /* 전사용 권한 조인 테이블 */ ON A1.GRP_ORG_C = D.GRP_ORG_C AND A1.ENO = D.ENO AND D.BRC IN (SELECT BRC FROM TB_OR_OM_ORGZ WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND HOFC_BIZO_DSC = '01' AND UYN = 'Y') LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OH_ORGZ_EMP_AUTH D001 /* 시스템관리자 */ ON C.GRP_ORG_C = D001.GRP_ORG_C --AND C.BRC = D001.BRC AND C.ENO = D001.ENO AND D001.AUTH_GRP_ID = '001' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OH_ORGZ_EMP_AUTH D002 /* ORM전담 */ ON C.GRP_ORG_C = D002.GRP_ORG_C --AND C.BRC = D002.BRC AND C.ENO = D002.ENO AND D002.AUTH_GRP_ID = '002' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OH_ORGZ_EMP_AUTH D003 /* 부서ORM업무담당자 */ ON C.GRP_ORG_C = D003.GRP_ORG_C AND C.BRC = D003.BRC AND C.ENO = D003.ENO AND D003.AUTH_GRP_ID = '003' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OH_ORGZ_EMP_AUTH D004 /* 본부부서 팀장 */ ON C.GRP_ORG_C = D004.GRP_ORG_C AND C.BRC = D004.BRC AND C.ENO = D004.ENO AND D004.AUTH_GRP_ID = '004' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OH_ORGZ_EMP_AUTH D005 /* 본부부서 부장 */ ON C.GRP_ORG_C = D005.GRP_ORG_C AND C.BRC = D005.BRC AND C.ENO = D005.ENO AND D005.AUTH_GRP_ID = '005' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OH_ORGZ_EMP_AUTH D006 /* 지점장(영업점) */ ON C.GRP_ORG_C = D006.GRP_ORG_C AND C.BRC = D006.BRC AND C.ENO = D006.ENO AND D006.AUTH_GRP_ID = '006' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OH_ORGZ_EMP_AUTH D008 /* 일반사용자(부서) */ ON C.GRP_ORG_C = D008.GRP_ORG_C AND C.BRC = D008.BRC AND C.ENO = D008.ENO AND D008.AUTH_GRP_ID = '008' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OH_ORGZ_EMP_AUTH D009 /* ORM팀장 */ ON C.GRP_ORG_C = D009.GRP_ORG_C --AND C.BRC = D009.BRC AND C.ENO = D009.ENO AND D009.AUTH_GRP_ID = '009' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OH_ORGZ_EMP_AUTH D010 /* BCP팀장*/ ON C.GRP_ORG_C = D010.GRP_ORG_C AND C.BRC = D010.BRC AND C.ENO = D010.ENO AND D010.AUTH_GRP_ID = '010' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_CODE CO01 ON A.PZCC = CO01.IDVDC_VAL AND CO01.INTG_GRP_C = 'PZCC' WHERE A1.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND A1.BRC = TRIM(#sel_brc#)
ORDER BY NVL(A.PZCC,'XX'), A.ENO

sql.data: INSERT INTO TB_OR_OM_BTWK_SCHD ( GRP_ORG_C, BTWK_ID, BTWKNM, BTWK_EXE_FQ_DSC, HLDY_WK_EXE_DSC , MFT_ID, BAT_EXE_PATHNM, SURC_FL_PATHNM, SURC_FLNM, WK_CHK_FL_XCRNM , TRGT_FL_PATHNM, WK_SFILE_XCRNM, FL_STB_HR, RZV_DD, RZV_MRK_C , BMM_HLDY_RZV_YN, EXE_X_YN, VLD_YN , BTWK_BASDT_DSC, TMS_FL_PATH_DSC, BTWK_PGM_DSC , BTWK_LOG_PATHNM, STM_WK_IMP_BTWK_CN, WK_REL_SFLECN , NO1_STM_WK_IMP_BTWK_ID, NO2_STM_WK_IMP_BTWK_ID, NO3_STM_WK_IMP_BTWK_ID , NO4_STM_WK_IMP_BTWK_ID, NO5_STM_WK_IMP_BTWK_ID, NO6_STM_WK_IMP_BTWK_ID , NO7_STM_WK_IMP_BTWK_ID, NO8_STM_WK_IMP_BTWK_ID, NO9_STM_WK_IMP_BTWK_ID , NO10_STM_WK_IMP_BTWK_ID , FIR_INP_DTM, FIR_INPMN_ENO, LSCHG_DTM, LS_WKR_ENO) VALUES ( TRIM(#grp_org_c#), TRIM(#btwk_id#), TRIM(#btwknm#), TRIM(#btwk_exe_fq_dsc#), TRIM(#hldy_wk_exe_dsc#) , TRIM(#mft_id#), TRIM(#bat_exe_pathnm#), TRIM(#surc_fl_pathnm#), TRIM(#surc_flnm#), TRIM(#wk_chk_fl_xcrnm#) , TRIM(#trgt_fl_pathnm#), TRIM(#wk_sfile_xcrnm#), TRIM(#fl_stb_hr#), TRIM(#rzv_dd#), TRIM(#rzv_mrk_c#) , TRIM(#bmm_hldy_rzv_yn#), TRIM(#exe_x_yn#), 'Y' , TRIM(#btwk_basdt_dsc#), TRIM(#c_tms_fl_path_dsc#), '1' , NULL, #imp_btwk_cnt#, NULL , TRIM(#imp_btwk_id1#), TRIM(#imp_btwk_id2#), TRIM(#imp_btwk_id3#) , TRIM(#imp_btwk_id4#), TRIM(#imp_btwk_id5#), TRIM(#imp_btwk_id6#) , TRIM(#imp_btwk_id7#), TRIM(#imp_btwk_id8#), TRIM(#imp_btwk_id9#) , TRIM(#imp_btwk_id10#) , SYSDATE, TRIM(#userid#), SYSDATE, TRIM(#userid#))

sql.name: SQL01
sql.data: INSERT INTO TB_OR_OH_BTWK_PRCD ( GRP_ORG_C, BTWK_ID, UP_GRP_ORG_C, UP_BTWK_ID , FIR_INP_DTM, FIR_INPMN_ENO, LSCHG_DTM, LS_WKR_ENO) VALUES( TRIM(#grp_org_c#), TRIM(#btwk_id#), TRIM(#prd_grp_org_c#), TRIM(#prd_btwk_id#) , SYSDATE, TRIM(#userid#), SYSDATE, TRIM(#userid#) )

sql.name: SQL01
sql.data: UPDATE TB_OR_OM_BTWK_SCHD SET WK_REL_SFLECN = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_OR_OH_BTWK_PRCD WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND BTWK_ID = TRIM(#btwk_id#)) WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND BTWK_ID = TRIM(#btwk_id#)

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: SELECT NVL(IDVDC_VAL,' ') INTGC, NVL(INTG_IDVD_CNM,' ') INTG_CNM FROM TB_OR_OM_CODE WHERE GRP_ORG_C = #grp_org_c# AND INTG_GRP_C = 'BTWK_EXE_FQ_DSC' AND C_UYN = 'Y' ORDER BY SORT_SQ

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: SELECT NVL(IDVDC_VAL,' ') INTGC, NVL(INTG_IDVD_CNM,' ') INTG_CNM FROM TB_OR_OM_CODE WHERE GRP_ORG_C = #grp_org_c# AND INTG_GRP_C = 'HLDY_WK_EXE_DSC' AND C_UYN = 'Y' ORDER BY SORT_SQ

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: SELECT NVL(IDVDC_VAL,' ') INTGC, NVL(INTG_IDVD_CNM,' ') INTG_CNM FROM TB_OR_OM_CODE WHERE GRP_ORG_C = #grp_org_c# AND INTG_GRP_C = 'RZV_MRK_C' AND C_UYN = 'Y' ORDER BY SORT_SQ

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C , A.BTWK_ID , A.BTWKNM , A.BTWK_EXE_FQ_DSC , ( SELECT INTG_IDVD_CNM FROM TB_OR_OM_CODE C1 WHERE C1.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND C1.INTG_GRP_C = 'BTWK_EXE_FQ_DSC' AND A.BTWK_EXE_FQ_DSC = C1.IDVDC_VAL ) BTWK_EXE_FQ_DSNM , A.HLDY_WK_EXE_DSC , CASE WHEN (A.MFT_ID IS NULL OR A.MFT_ID = '') THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END MFT_YN , A.MFT_ID , A.BAT_EXE_PATHNM , A.SURC_FL_PATHNM , A.SURC_FLNM , A.WK_CHK_FL_XCRNM , A.TRGT_FL_PATHNM , A.WK_SFILE_XCRNM , A.FL_STB_HR , A.RZV_DD , A.RZV_MRK_C , A.BMM_HLDY_RZV_YN , A.EXE_X_YN , A.BTWK_BASDT_DSC , A.TMS_FL_PATH_DSC , A.NO1_STM_WK_IMP_BTWK_ID IMP_BTWK_ID1 , A.NO2_STM_WK_IMP_BTWK_ID IMP_BTWK_ID2 , A.NO3_STM_WK_IMP_BTWK_ID IMP_BTWK_ID3 , A.NO4_STM_WK_IMP_BTWK_ID IMP_BTWK_ID4 , A.NO4_STM_WK_IMP_BTWK_ID IMP_BTWK_ID5 , A.NO6_STM_WK_IMP_BTWK_ID IMP_BTWK_ID6 , A.NO7_STM_WK_IMP_BTWK_ID IMP_BTWK_ID7 , A.NO8_STM_WK_IMP_BTWK_ID IMP_BTWK_ID8 , A.NO9_STM_WK_IMP_BTWK_ID IMP_BTWK_ID9 , A.NO10_STM_WK_IMP_BTWK_ID IMP_BTWK_ID10 , C1.BTWKNM IMP_BTWK_NM1 , C2.BTWKNM IMP_BTWK_NM2 , C3.BTWKNM IMP_BTWK_NM3 , C4.BTWKNM IMP_BTWK_NM4 , C5.BTWKNM IMP_BTWK_NM5 , C6.BTWKNM IMP_BTWK_NM6 , C7.BTWKNM IMP_BTWK_NM7 , C8.BTWKNM IMP_BTWK_NM8 , C9.BTWKNM IMP_BTWK_NM9 , C10.BTWKNM IMP_BTWK_NM10 FROM TB_OR_OM_BTWK_SCHD A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_GRPORG B ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_BTWK_SCHD C1 ON A.GRP_ORG_C = C1.GRP_ORG_C AND A.NO1_STM_WK_IMP_BTWK_ID = C1.BTWK_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_BTWK_SCHD C2 ON A.GRP_ORG_C = C2.GRP_ORG_C AND A.NO2_STM_WK_IMP_BTWK_ID = C2.BTWK_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_BTWK_SCHD C3 ON A.GRP_ORG_C = C3.GRP_ORG_C AND A.NO3_STM_WK_IMP_BTWK_ID = C3.BTWK_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_BTWK_SCHD C4 ON A.GRP_ORG_C = C4.GRP_ORG_C AND A.NO4_STM_WK_IMP_BTWK_ID = C4.BTWK_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_BTWK_SCHD C5 ON A.GRP_ORG_C = C5.GRP_ORG_C AND A.NO5_STM_WK_IMP_BTWK_ID = C5.BTWK_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_BTWK_SCHD C6 ON A.GRP_ORG_C = C6.GRP_ORG_C AND A.NO6_STM_WK_IMP_BTWK_ID = C6.BTWK_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_BTWK_SCHD C7 ON A.GRP_ORG_C = C7.GRP_ORG_C AND A.NO7_STM_WK_IMP_BTWK_ID = C7.BTWK_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_BTWK_SCHD C8 ON A.GRP_ORG_C = C8.GRP_ORG_C AND A.NO8_STM_WK_IMP_BTWK_ID = C8.BTWK_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_BTWK_SCHD C9 ON A.GRP_ORG_C = C9.GRP_ORG_C AND A.NO9_STM_WK_IMP_BTWK_ID = C9.BTWK_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_BTWK_SCHD C10 ON A.GRP_ORG_C = C10.GRP_ORG_C AND A.NO10_STM_WK_IMP_BTWK_ID = C10.BTWK_ID WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND A.BTWK_ID = TRIM(#sel_btwk_id#)

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: SELECT A.UP_GRP_ORG_C GRP_ORG_C , B.GRP_ORGNM GRP_ORGNM , A.UP_BTWK_ID BTWK_ID , C.BTWKNM , C.BTWK_EXE_FQ_DSC , D.INTG_IDVD_CNM BTWK_EXE_FQ_DSNM FROM TB_OR_OH_BTWK_PRCD A INNER JOIN TB_OR_OM_GRPORG B ON A.UP_GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C INNER JOIN TB_OR_OM_BTWK_SCHD C ON A.UP_GRP_ORG_C = C.GRP_ORG_C AND A.UP_BTWK_ID = C.BTWK_ID INNER JOIN TB_OR_OM_CODE D ON D.INTG_GRP_C = 'BTWK_EXE_FQ_DSC' AND C.BTWK_EXE_FQ_DSC = D.IDVDC_VAL WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#sel_grp_org_c#) AND A.BTWK_ID = TRIM(#sel_btwk_id#)

sql.name: SQL01
sql.data: SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C , B.GRP_ORGNM , A.BTWK_ID , A.BTWKNM , A.BTWK_EXE_FQ_DSC , CASE WHEN A.BTWK_EXE_FQ_DSC = '1' THEN '일' ELSE '월' END BTWK_EXE_FQ_DSC_NM , A.MFT_ID , A.SURC_FLNM , CASE WHEN D.BAS_DT >= C.BTWK_BAS_DT THEN '수동' ELSE '자동' END AUT_MNU_DSC , CASE WHEN D.BAS_DT >= C.BTWK_BAS_DT THEN D.CMDL_PRC_ST_DTM ELSE TO_CHAR(C.BTWK_ST_DTM,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') END ST_DTM , CASE WHEN D.BAS_DT >= C.BTWK_BAS_DT THEN D.CMDL_PRC_ED_DTM ELSE TO_CHAR(C.BTWK_ED_DTM,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') END ED_DTM , CASE WHEN D.BAS_DT >= C.BTWK_BAS_DT THEN CMDL_PRCRZT_C ELSE C.BTWK_STSC END RZT_C , TRIM(REPLACE(#sch_btwk_bas_dt#,'-','')) BAS_DT FROM TB_OR_OM_BTWK_SCHD A INNER JOIN TB_OR_OM_GRPORG B ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C AND B.GRP_ORG_C <> '99' LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM TB_OR_OM_BAT_JOB_STAT A WHERE (A.GRP_ORG_C, A.GRP_BAT_PGID, A.BTWK_BAS_DT, A.BTWK_ED_DTM) IN ( SELECT GRP_ORG_C, GRP_BAT_PGID, BTWK_BAS_DT, MAX(BTWK_ED_DTM) FROM TB_OR_OM_BAT_JOB_STAT GROUP BY GRP_ORG_C, GRP_BAT_PGID, BTWK_BAS_DT ) ) C ON A.GRP_ORG_C = C.GRP_ORG_C AND A.BTWK_ID = C.GRP_BAT_PGID LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM TB_OR_OM_CMDL_EXE A WHERE CMDL_DSC = '02' AND (A.GRP_ORG_C, A.BTWK_ID, A.BAS_DT, A.CMDL_PRC_ED_DTM) IN ( SELECT GRP_ORG_C, BTWK_ID, BAS_DT, MAX(CMDL_PRC_ED_DTM) FROM TB_OR_OM_CMDL_EXE WHERE CMDL_DSC = '02' GROUP BY GRP_ORG_C, BTWK_ID, BAS_DT ) ) D ON A.GRP_ORG_C = D.GRP_ORG_C AND A.BTWK_ID = D.BTWK_ID WHERE A.TMS_FL_PATH_DSC= '1'

sql.name: SQL02
sql.data: AND A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#sch_grp_org_c#)

sql.name: SQL03
sql.data: AND A.BTWK_EXE_FQ_DSC = TRIM(#sch_btwk_exe_fq_dsc#)

sql.name: SQL04
sql.data: AND ((CASE WHEN D.BAS_DT >= C.BTWK_BAS_DT THEN D.BAS_DT ELSE C.BTWK_BAS_DT END) = TRIM(REPLACE(#sch_btwk_bas_dt#,'-','')) OR (CASE WHEN D.BAS_DT >= C.BTWK_BAS_DT THEN D.BAS_DT ELSE C.BTWK_BAS_DT END) IS NULL)

sql.name: SQL05
sql.data: AND UPPER(A.BTWK_ID) LIKE '%%'||UPPER(TRIM(#sch_btwk_id#))||'%%'

sql.name: SQL06
sql.data: AND UPPER(A.BTWKNM) LIKE '%%'||UPPER(TRIM(#sch_btwknm#))||'%%'

sql.name: SQL07
sql.data: AND (CASE WHEN D.BAS_DT >= A.BTWK_BAS_DT THEN '1' ELSE '2' END) = TRIM(#sch_btwk_exe_dsc#)

sql.name: SQL08
sql.data: ORDER BY A.BTWK_ID, A.GRP_ORG_C

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: SELECT NVL(MAX(A.CMDL_EXE_SQNO), 0)+1 CMDL_EXE_SQNO FROM TB_OR_OM_CMDL_EXE A

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: INSERT INTO TB_OR_OM_CMDL_EXE ( CMDL_EXE_SQNO /* 명령어실행일련번호 */ , CMDL_DSC /* 명령어구분코드 */ , AUT_MNU_DSC /* 자동수동구분코드 */ , CMDL_PATHNM /* 명령어경로명 */ , CMDL_CNTN /* 명령어내용 */ , CMDL_PRCRZT_CNTN /* 명령어처리결과내용 */ , GRP_ORG_C /* 그룹기관코드 */ , BTWK_ID /* 배치작업ID */ , BAS_DT /* 기준일자 */ , CMDL_RQR_DTM /* 명령어요청일시 */ , CMDL_PRC_ST_DTM /* 명령어처리시작일시 */ , CMDL_PRC_ED_DTM /* 명령어처리종료일시 */ , CMDL_PRC_STSC /* 명령어처리상태코드 */ , CMDL_PRCRZT_C /* 명령어처리결과코드 */ , MFT_FL_EXT_YN /* MFT파일존재여부 */ , FIR_INP_DTM /* 최초입력일시 */ , FIR_INPMN_ENO /* 최초입력자개인번호 */ , LSCHG_DTM /* 최종변경일시 */ , LS_WKR_ENO /* 최종작업자개인번호 */ )VALUES( #cmdl_exe_sqno# , TRIM(#cmdl_dsc#) , TRIM(#aut_mnu_dsc#) , TRIM(#cmdl_pathnm#) , TRIM(#cmdl_cntn#) , NULL , TRIM(#grp_org_c#) , TRIM(#btwk_id#) , TRIM(#bas_dt#) , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') , NULL , NULL , '01' , NULL , NULL , SYSDATE , 'SYSTEM' , SYSDATE , 'SYSTEM' )

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: SELECT CMDL_EXE_SQNO , CMDL_DSC , AUT_MNU_DSC , CMDL_PATHNM , CMDL_CNTN , CMDL_PRCRZT_CNTN , GRP_ORG_C , BTWK_ID , BAS_DT , CMDL_RQR_DTM , CMDL_PRC_ST_DTM , CMDL_PRC_ED_DTM , CMDL_PRC_STSC , CMDL_PRCRZT_C , MFT_FL_EXT_YN FROM TB_OR_OM_CMDL_EXE WHERE CMDL_EXE_SQNO BETWEEN #min_cmdl_exe_sqno# AND #max_cmdl_exe_sqno# ORDER BY CMDL_EXE_SQNO

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data:
SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C , A.ENO , C.BRC , A.CHRG_EMPNM EMPNM , CO02.INTG_IDVD_CNM OFT , B.BRNM , CASE WHEN AUTH_OPE.AUTH_GRP_ID = '003' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AUTH_003 , CASE WHEN AUTH_OPE.AUTH_GRP_ID = '014' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AUTH_014 , CASE WHEN AUTH_OPE.AUTH_GRP_ID = '006' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AUTH_006 FROM TB_OR_OM_EMP A INNER JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ B ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C AND A.BRC = B.BRC INNER JOIN TB_OR_OH_ORGZ_EMP C /* 운영리스크 부서용 권한 테이블 */ ON A.GRP_ORG_C = C.GRP_ORG_C AND A.ENO = C.ENO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OH_ORGZ_EMP_AUTH AUTH_OPE /* 003:부서 업무 담당자 , 004:부서팀장 , 006:지점장 , 005:부장 */ ON C.GRP_ORG_C = AUTH_OPE.GRP_ORG_C AND C.BRC = AUTH_OPE.BRC AND C.ENO = AUTH_OPE.ENO AND AUTH_OPE.AUTH_GRP_ID IN ('003','004','005','006') LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_CODE CO01 ON A.PZCC = CO01.IDVDC_VAL AND CO01.INTG_GRP_C = 'PZCC' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_CODE CO02 ON A.OFT_C = CO02.IDVDC_VAL AND CO02.INTG_GRP_C = 'OFT_C' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OR_OM_CODE CO03 ON A.TEAM_CD = CO03.IDVDC_VAL AND CO03.INTG_GRP_C = 'TEAM_CD' WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#)
AND C.BRC = TRIM(#brc#)
ORDER BY DECODE(CO01.INTG_IDVD_CNM,'텔러직','XX',NVL(A.PZCC,'XX')), A.ENO

sql.name: SQL01
sql.data: DELETE FROM TB_OR_OH_ORGZ_EMP_AUTH WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND BRC = TRIM(#brc#)

sql.name: SQL02
sql.data: INSERT INTO TB_OR_OH_ORGZ_EMP_AUTH ( GRP_ORG_C , BRC , AUTH_GRP_ID , ENO , FIR_INP_DTM , FIR_INPMN_ENO , LSCHG_DTM , LS_WKR_ENO ) VALUES ( TRIM(#grp_org_c#) , TRIM(#brc#) , '003' , TRIM(#eno#) , SYSDATE , TRIM(#userid#) , SYSDATE , TRIM(#userid#) )

sql.name: SQL03
sql.data: INSERT INTO TB_OR_OH_ORGZ_EMP_AUTH ( GRP_ORG_C , BRC , AUTH_GRP_ID , ENO , FIR_INP_DTM , FIR_INPMN_ENO , LSCHG_DTM , LS_WKR_ENO ) VALUES ( TRIM(#grp_org_c#) , TRIM(#brc#) , '006' , TRIM(#eno#) , SYSDATE , TRIM(#userid#) , SYSDATE , TRIM(#userid#) )

sql.data: INSERT INTO TB_OR_OH_ORGZ_EMP_AUTH ( GRP_ORG_C , BRC , AUTH_GRP_ID , ENO , FIR_INP_DTM , FIR_INPMN_ENO , LSCHG_DTM , LS_WKR_ENO ) VALUES ( TRIM(#grp_org_c#) , TRIM(#brc#) , '014' , TRIM(#eno#) , SYSDATE , TRIM(#userid#) , SYSDATE , TRIM(#userid#) )

sql.name: SQL05
sql.data: INSERT INTO TB_OR_OH_ORGZ_EMP_AUTH ( GRP_ORG_C , BRC , AUTH_GRP_ID , ENO , FIR_INP_DTM , FIR_INPMN_ENO , LSCHG_DTM , LS_WKR_ENO ) VALUES ( TRIM(#grp_org_c#) , TRIM(#brc#) , '008' , TRIM(#eno#) , SYSDATE , TRIM(#userid#) , SYSDATE , TRIM(#userid#) )

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: SELECT NVL(A.TABLESPACE_NAME,'TOTAL') TABLESPACE_NAME , ROUND(SUM(TOTAL) / POWER(1024,3),1) TOTAL_SIZE , ROUND((SUM(TOTAL) - SUM(FREE))/ POWER(1024,3),1) USED_SIZE , ROUND(SUM(FREE) / POWER(1024,3),1) FREE_SIZE , ROUND(SUM(FREE)/SUM(TOTAL)*100) USE_RATE FROM (SELECT TABLESPACE_NAME, SUM(BYTES) FREE FROM SYS.DBA_FREE_SPACE WHERE TABLESPACE_NAME LIKE '%%'||'FGOR'||'%%' GROUP BY TABLESPACE_NAME ) A, (SELECT TABLESPACE_NAME, SUM(BYTES) TOTAL FROM SYS.DBA_DATA_FILES WHERE TABLESPACE_NAME LIKE '%%'||'FGOR'||'%%' GROUP BY TABLESPACE_NAME ) B WHERE A.TABLESPACE_NAME = B.TABLESPACE_NAME GROUP BY ROLLUP(A.TABLESPACE_NAME)

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: SELECT NVL(MAX(A.CMDL_EXE_SQNO), 0)+1 CMDL_EXE_SQNO FROM TB_OR_OM_CMDL_EXE A

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: INSERT INTO TB_OR_OM_CMDL_EXE ( CMDL_EXE_SQNO /* 명령어실행일련번호 */ , CMDL_DSC /* 명령어구분코드 */ , AUT_MNU_DSC /* 자동수동구분코드 */ , CMDL_PATHNM /* 명령어경로명 */ , CMDL_CNTN /* 명령어내용 */ , CMDL_PRCRZT_CNTN /* 명령어처리결과내용 */ , GRP_ORG_C /* 그룹기관코드 */ , BTWK_ID /* 배치작업ID */ , BAS_DT /* 기준일자 */ , CMDL_RQR_DTM /* 명령어요청일시 */ , CMDL_PRC_ST_DTM /* 명령어처리시작일시 */ , CMDL_PRC_ED_DTM /* 명령어처리종료일시 */ , CMDL_PRC_STSC /* 명령어처리상태코드 */ , CMDL_PRCRZT_C /* 명령어처리결과코드 */ , MFT_FL_EXT_YN /* MFT파일존재여부 */ , FIR_INP_DTM /* 최초입력일시 */ , FIR_INPMN_ENO /* 최초입력자개인번호 */ , LSCHG_DTM /* 최종변경일시 */ , LS_WKR_ENO /* 최종작업자개인번호 */ )VALUES( #cmdl_exe_sqno# , TRIM(#cmdl_dsc#) , TRIM(#aut_mnu_dsc#) , TRIM(#cmdl_pathnm#) , TRIM(#cmdl_cntn#) , NULL , TRIM(#grp_org_c#) , TRIM(#btwk_id#) , TRIM(#bas_dt#) , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') , NULL , NULL , '01' , NULL , NULL , SYSDATE , 'SYSTEM' , SYSDATE , 'SYSTEM' )

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: SELECT #cnt# + 1 CNT FROM DUAL

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: SELECT #cmdl_exe_sqno# - #cnt# MIN_CMDL_EXE_SQNO , #cmdl_exe_sqno# MAX_CMDL_EXE_SQNO FROM DUAL

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: SELECT A.TABLESPACE_NAME, A.TABLE_NAME , B.COMMENTS , PARTITION_NAME_MAX , PARTITION_NAME_MIN , PARTITION_NAME , DECODE(LENGTH(A.PARTITION_NAME),8,'파티션키값',10,'년월','일자') AS TYP FROM ( SELECT TABLESPACE_NAME, TABLE_NAME , PARTITION_NAME_MAX , PARTITION_NAME_MIN , PARTITION_NAME FROM ( SELECT TABLESPACE_NAME, TABLE_NAME , MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(PARTITION_NAME,5,6))) AS PARTITION_NAME_MAX , MIN(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(PARTITION_NAME,5,6))) AS PARTITION_NAME_MIN , MAX(PARTITION_NAME) AS PARTITION_NAME FROM ALL_TAB_PARTITIONS WHERE TABLE_OWNER = 'FGOR' AND TABLE_NAME LIKE 'TB_%%' AND LENGTH(PARTITION_NAME) > 8 GROUP BY TABLESPACE_NAME, TABLE_NAME ) ) A , ALL_TAB_COMMENTS B WHERE B.OWNER = 'FGOR' AND A.TABLE_NAME = B.TABLE_NAME(+) ORDER BY A.TABLESPACE_NAME, A.TABLE_NAME

sql.name: SQL1
sql.data: SELECT BAS_YM FROM TB_OR_OM_SCHD ORDER BY BAS_YM ASC

sql.name: SQL1
sql.data: SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'MM') BAS_MM FROM DUAL

sql.name: SQL1
sql.data: SELECT 'RCSA' AREA, MIN(JAN) JAN, MIN(FEB) FEB, MIN(MAR) MAR, MIN(APR) APR, MIN(MAY) MAY, MIN(JUN) JUN, MIN(JUL) JUL, MIN(AUG) AUG, MIN(SEP) SEP, MIN(OCT) OCT, MIN(NOV) NOV, MIN(DEC) DEC FROM( SELECT DECODE(SUBSTR(RCSA,0,7),'01RCSA1',1,'01RCSA0',0,'01RCSA2',2,3) AS JAN , DECODE(SUBSTR(RCSA,0,7),'02RCSA1',1,'02RCSA0',0,'02RCSA2',2,3) AS FEB , DECODE(SUBSTR(RCSA,0,7),'03RCSA1',1,'03RCSA0',0,'03RCSA2',2,3) AS MAR , DECODE(SUBSTR(RCSA,0,7),'04RCSA1',1,'04RCSA0',0,'04RCSA2',2,3) AS APR , DECODE(SUBSTR(RCSA,0,7),'05RCSA1',1,'05RCSA0',0,'05RCSA2',2,3) AS MAY , DECODE(SUBSTR(RCSA,0,7),'06RCSA1',1,'06RCSA0',0,'06RCSA2',2,3) AS JUN , DECODE(SUBSTR(RCSA,0,7),'07RCSA1',1,'07RCSA0',0,'07RCSA2',2,3) AS JUL , DECODE(SUBSTR(RCSA,0,7),'08RCSA1',1,'08RCSA0',0,'08RCSA2',2,3) AS AUG , DECODE(SUBSTR(RCSA,0,7),'09RCSA1',1,'09RCSA0',0,'09RCSA2',2,3) AS SEP , DECODE(SUBSTR(RCSA,0,7),'10RCSA1',1,'10RCSA0',0,'10RCSA2',2,3) AS OCT , DECODE(SUBSTR(RCSA,0,7),'11RCSA1',1,'11RCSA0',0,'11RCSA2',2,3) AS NOV , DECODE(SUBSTR(RCSA,0,7),'12RCSA1',1,'12RCSA0',0,'12RCSA2',2,3) AS DEC FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN RK_EVL_TGT_YN = 'Y' AND SYSDATE BETWEEN RK_EVL_ST_DT AND RK_EVL_ED_DT THEN CONCAT((SUBSTR(BAS_YM,5,2)),'RCSA1') WHEN RK_EVL_TGT_YN = 'Y' AND SYSDATE > RK_EVL_ED_DT THEN CONCAT((SUBSTR(BAS_YM,5,2)),'RCSA0') WHEN RK_EVL_TGT_YN = 'Y' AND SYSDATE < RK_EVL_ST_DT THEN CONCAT((SUBSTR(BAS_YM,5,2)),'RCSA2') END RCSA FROM TB_OR_OM_SCHD WHERE SUBSTR(BAS_YM,0,4) = TRIM(#sch_bas_y#) ) GROUP BY RCSA ) UNION ALL SELECT 'KRI' KRI, MIN(JAN), MIN(FEB), MIN(MAR) MAR, MIN(APR) APR, MIN(MAY) MAY, MIN(JUN) JUN, MIN(JUL) JUL, MIN(AUG) AUG, MIN(SEP) SEP, MIN(OCT) OCT, MIN(NOV) NOV, MIN(DEC) DEC FROM( SELECT DECODE(SUBSTR(KRI,0,6),'01KRI1',1,'01KRI0',0,'01KRI2',2,3) AS JAN , DECODE(SUBSTR(KRI,0,6),'02KRI1',1,'02KRI0',0,'02KRI2',2,3) AS FEB , DECODE(SUBSTR(KRI,0,6),'03KRI1',1,'03KRI0',0,'03KRI2',2,3) AS MAR , DECODE(SUBSTR(KRI,0,6),'04KRI1',1,'04KRI0',0,'04KRI2',2,3) AS APR , DECODE(SUBSTR(KRI,0,6),'05KRI1',1,'05KRI0',0,'05KRI2',2,3) AS MAY , DECODE(SUBSTR(KRI,0,6),'06KRI1',1,'06KRI0',0,'06KRI2',2,3) AS JUN , DECODE(SUBSTR(KRI,0,6),'07KRI1',1,'07KRI0',0,'07KRI2',2,3) AS JUL , DECODE(SUBSTR(KRI,0,6),'08KRI1',1,'08KRI0',0,'08KRI2',2,3) AS AUG , DECODE(SUBSTR(KRI,0,6),'09KRI1',1,'09KRI0',0,'09KRI2',2,3) AS SEP , DECODE(SUBSTR(KRI,0,6),'10KRI1',1,'10KRI0',0,'10KRI2',2,3) AS OCT , DECODE(SUBSTR(KRI,0,6),'11KRI1',1,'11KRI0',0,'11KRI2',2,3) AS NOV , DECODE(SUBSTR(KRI,0,6),'12KRI1',1,'12KRI0',0,'12KRI2',2,3) AS DEC FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN SYSDATE BETWEEN RKI_ST_DT AND RKI_ED_DT THEN CONCAT((SUBSTR(BAS_YM,5,2)),'KRI1') WHEN SYSDATE > RKI_ED_DT THEN CONCAT((SUBSTR(BAS_YM,5,2)),'KRI0') WHEN SYSDATE < RKI_ST_DT THEN CONCAT((SUBSTR(BAS_YM,5,2)),'KRI2') END KRI FROM TB_OR_OM_SCHD WHERE SUBSTR(BAS_YM,0,4) = TRIM(#sch_bas_y#) ) GROUP BY KRI ) UNION ALL SELECT 'REP' REP, MIN(JAN), MIN(FEB), MIN(MAR) MAR, MIN(APR) APR, MIN(MAY) MAY, MIN(JUN) JUN, MIN(JUL) JUL, MIN(AUG) AUG, MIN(SEP) SEP, MIN(OCT) OCT, MIN(NOV) NOV, MIN(DEC) DEC FROM( SELECT DECODE(SUBSTR(REP,0,6),'01REP1',1,'01REP0',0,'01REP2',2,3) AS JAN , DECODE(SUBSTR(REP,0,6),'02REP1',1,'02REP0',0,'02REP2',2,3) AS FEB , DECODE(SUBSTR(REP,0,6),'03REP1',1,'03REP0',0,'03REP2',2,3) AS MAR , DECODE(SUBSTR(REP,0,6),'04REP1',1,'04REP0',0,'04REP2',2,3) AS APR , DECODE(SUBSTR(REP,0,6),'05REP1',1,'05REP0',0,'05REP2',2,3) AS MAY , DECODE(SUBSTR(REP,0,6),'06REP1',1,'06REP0',0,'06REP2',2,3) AS JUN , DECODE(SUBSTR(REP,0,6),'07REP1',1,'07REP0',0,'07REP2',2,3) AS JUL , DECODE(SUBSTR(REP,0,6),'08REP1',1,'08REP0',0,'08REP2',2,3) AS AUG , DECODE(SUBSTR(REP,0,6),'09REP1',1,'09REP0',0,'09REP2',2,3) AS SEP , DECODE(SUBSTR(REP,0,6),'10REP1',1,'10REP0',0,'10REP2',2,3) AS OCT , DECODE(SUBSTR(REP,0,6),'11REP1',1,'11REP0',0,'11REP2',2,3) AS NOV , DECODE(SUBSTR(REP,0,6),'12REP1',1,'12REP0',0,'12REP2',2,3) AS DEC FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN REP_EVL_TGT_YN = 'Y' AND SYSDATE BETWEEN REP_RKI_ST_DT AND REP_RKI_ED_DT THEN CONCAT((SUBSTR(BAS_YM,5,2)),'REP1') WHEN REP_EVL_TGT_YN = 'Y' AND SYSDATE > REP_RKI_ED_DT THEN CONCAT((SUBSTR(BAS_YM,5,2)),'REP0') WHEN REP_EVL_TGT_YN = 'Y' AND SYSDATE < REP_RKI_ST_DT THEN CONCAT((SUBSTR(BAS_YM,5,2)),'REP2') END REP FROM TB_OR_OM_SCHD WHERE SUBSTR(BAS_YM,0,4) = TRIM(#sch_bas_y#) ) GROUP BY REP ) UNION ALL SELECT 'BIA' BIA, MIN(JAN), MIN(FEB), MIN(MAR) MAR, MIN(APR) APR, MIN(MAY) MAY, MIN(JUN) JUN, MIN(JUL) JUL, MIN(AUG) AUG, MIN(SEP) SEP, MIN(OCT) OCT, MIN(NOV) NOV, MIN(DEC) DEC FROM( SELECT DECODE(SUBSTR(BIA,0,6),'01BIA1',1,'01BIA0',0,'01BIA2',2,3) AS JAN , DECODE(SUBSTR(BIA,0,6),'02BIA1',1,'02BIA0',0,'02BIA2',2,3) AS FEB , DECODE(SUBSTR(BIA,0,6),'03BIA1',1,'03BIA0',0,'03BIA2',2,3) AS MAR , DECODE(SUBSTR(BIA,0,6),'04BIA1',1,'04BIA0',0,'04BIA2',2,3) AS APR , DECODE(SUBSTR(BIA,0,6),'05BIA1',1,'05BIA0',0,'05BIA2',2,3) AS MAY , DECODE(SUBSTR(BIA,0,6),'06BIA1',1,'06BIA0',0,'06BIA2',2,3) AS JUN , DECODE(SUBSTR(BIA,0,6),'07BIA1',1,'07BIA0',0,'07BIA2',2,3) AS JUL , DECODE(SUBSTR(BIA,0,6),'08BIA1',1,'08BIA0',0,'08BIA2',2,3) AS AUG , DECODE(SUBSTR(BIA,0,6),'09BIA1',1,'09BIA0',0,'09BIA2',2,3) AS SEP , DECODE(SUBSTR(BIA,0,6),'10BIA1',1,'10BIA0',0,'10BIA2',2,3) AS OCT , DECODE(SUBSTR(BIA,0,6),'11BIA1',1,'11BIA0',0,'11BIA2',2,3) AS NOV , DECODE(SUBSTR(BIA,0,6),'12BIA1',1,'12BIA0',0,'12BIA2',2,3) AS DEC FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN BIA_EVL_TGT_YN = 'Y' AND SYSDATE BETWEEN BIA_EVL_ST_DT AND BIA_EVL_ED_DT THEN CONCAT((SUBSTR(BAS_YM,5,2)),'BIA1') WHEN BIA_EVL_TGT_YN = 'Y' AND SYSDATE > BIA_EVL_ED_DT THEN CONCAT((SUBSTR(BAS_YM,5,2)),'BIA0') WHEN BIA_EVL_TGT_YN = 'Y' AND SYSDATE < BIA_EVL_ST_DT THEN CONCAT((SUBSTR(BAS_YM,5,2)),'BIA2') END BIA FROM TB_OR_OM_SCHD WHERE SUBSTR(BAS_YM,0,4) = TRIM(#sch_bas_y#) ) GROUP BY BIA ) UNION ALL SELECT 'RA' RA, MIN(JAN), MIN(FEB), MIN(MAR) MAR, MIN(APR) APR, MIN(MAY) MAY, MIN(JUN) JUN, MIN(JUL) JUL, MIN(AUG) AUG, MIN(SEP) SEP, MIN(OCT) OCT, MIN(NOV) NOV, MIN(DEC) DEC FROM( SELECT DECODE(SUBSTR(RA,0,5),'01RA1',1,'01RA0',0,'01RA2',2,3) AS JAN , DECODE(SUBSTR(RA,0,5),'02RA1',1,'02RA0',0,'02RA2',2,3) AS FEB , DECODE(SUBSTR(RA,0,5),'03RA1',1,'03RA0',0,'03RA2',2,3) AS MAR , DECODE(SUBSTR(RA,0,5),'04RA1',1,'04RA0',0,'04RA2',2,3) AS APR , DECODE(SUBSTR(RA,0,5),'05RA1',1,'05RA0',0,'05RA2',2,3) AS MAY , DECODE(SUBSTR(RA,0,5),'06RA1',1,'06RA0',0,'06RA2',2,3) AS JUN , DECODE(SUBSTR(RA,0,5),'07RA1',1,'07RA0',0,'07RA2',2,3) AS JUL , DECODE(SUBSTR(RA,0,5),'08RA1',1,'08RA0',0,'08RA2',2,3) AS AUG , DECODE(SUBSTR(RA,0,5),'09RA1',1,'09RA0',0,'09RA2',2,3) AS SEP , DECODE(SUBSTR(RA,0,5),'10RA1',1,'10RA0',0,'10RA2',2,3) AS OCT , DECODE(SUBSTR(RA,0,5),'11RA1',1,'11RA0',0,'11RA2',2,3) AS NOV , DECODE(SUBSTR(RA,0,5),'12RA1',1,'12RA0',0,'12RA2',2,3) AS DEC FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN RA_EVL_TGT_YN = 'Y' AND SYSDATE BETWEEN RA_EVL_ST_DT AND RA_EVL_ED_DT THEN CONCAT((SUBSTR(BAS_YM,5,2)),'RA1') WHEN RA_EVL_TGT_YN = 'Y' AND SYSDATE > RA_EVL_ED_DT THEN CONCAT((SUBSTR(BAS_YM,5,2)),'RA0') WHEN RA_EVL_TGT_YN = 'Y' AND SYSDATE < RA_EVL_ST_DT THEN CONCAT((SUBSTR(BAS_YM,5,2)),'RA2') END RA FROM TB_OR_OM_SCHD WHERE SUBSTR(BAS_YM,0,4) = TRIM(#sch_bas_y#) ) GROUP BY RA )

sql.name: SQL1
sql.data: SELECT AREA , RK_EVL_TGT_YN TGT_YN, RK_EVL_ST_DT ST_DT, RK_EVL_ED_DT ED_DT, RK_EVL_PRG_STSC, B.INTG_IDVD_CNM STSC FROM TB_OR_OM_SCHD A INNER JOIN TB_OR_OM_CODE B ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C AND B.INTG_GRP_C = 'RK_EVL_PRG_STSC' AND A.RK_EVL_PRG_STSC = B.IDVDC_VAL WHERE BAS_YM = CONCAT(TRIM(#sch_bas_y#),TRIM(#bas_mm#)) UNION ALL SELECT 'Y' KRI_YN, RKI_ST_DT, RKI_ED_DT, RKI_PRG_STSC, INTG_IDVD_CNM FROM TB_OR_OM_SCHD A INNER JOIN TB_OR_OM_CODE B ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C AND B.INTG_GRP_C = 'RKI_PRG_STSC' AND A.RKI_PRG_STSC = B.IDVDC_VAL WHERE BAS_YM = CONCAT(TRIM(#sch_bas_y#),TRIM(#bas_mm#)) UNION ALL SELECT REP_EVL_TGT_YN, REP_RKI_ST_DT, REP_RKI_ED_DT, REP_RKI_PRG_STSC, INTG_IDVD_CNM FROM TB_OR_OM_SCHD A INNER JOIN TB_OR_OM_CODE B ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C AND B.INTG_GRP_C = 'REP_RKI_PRG_STSC' AND A.REP_RKI_PRG_STSC = B.IDVDC_VAL WHERE BAS_YM = CONCAT(TRIM(#sch_bas_y#),TRIM(#bas_mm#)) UNION ALL SELECT BIA_EVL_TGT_YN, BIA_EVL_ST_DT, BIA_EVL_ED_DT, BIA_EVL_PRG_STSC, INTG_IDVD_CNM FROM TB_OR_OM_SCHD A INNER JOIN TB_OR_OM_CODE B ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C AND B.INTG_GRP_C = 'BIA_EVL_PRG_STSC' AND A.BIA_EVL_PRG_STSC = B.IDVDC_VAL WHERE BAS_YM = CONCAT(TRIM(#sch_bas_y#),TRIM(#bas_mm#)) UNION ALL SELECT RA_EVL_TGT_YN, RA_EVL_ST_DT, RA_EVL_ED_DT, RA_EVL_PRG_STSC, INTG_IDVD_CNM FROM TB_OR_OM_SCHD A INNER JOIN TB_OR_OM_CODE B ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C AND B.INTG_GRP_C = 'RA_EVL_PRG_STSC' AND A.RA_EVL_PRG_STSC = B.IDVDC_VAL WHERE BAS_YM = CONCAT(TRIM(#sch_bas_y#),TRIM(#bas_mm#))

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: SELECT NVL(IDVDC_VAL,' ') INTGC, NVL(INTG_IDVD_CNM,' ') INTG_CNM FROM TB_OR_OM_CODE WHERE GRP_ORG_C = #grp_org_c# AND INTG_GRP_C = #intg_grp_c1# AND C_UYN = 'Y' ORDER BY SORT_SQ

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: SELECT NVL(IDVDC_VAL,' ') INTGC, NVL(INTG_IDVD_CNM,' ') INTG_CNM FROM TB_OR_OM_CODE WHERE GRP_ORG_C = #grp_org_c# AND INTG_GRP_C = #intg_grp_c2# AND C_UYN = 'Y' ORDER BY SORT_SQ

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: SELECT GRP_ORG_C , LEVEL AS "LEVEL" , BRC , BRNM , UP_BRC , LVL_NO , BR_LKO_YN , NVL(RGN_C, '') AS RGN_C , HOFC_BIZO_DSC , NVL(LWST_ORGZ_YN, 'N') AS LWST_ORGZ_YN , NVL(UYN, 'N') AS UYN , TEMGR_DCZ_YN FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT * FROM TB_OR_OM_ORGZ WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND HOFC_BIZO_DSC IN ('01', '02', '12') START WITH HOFC_BIZO_DSC IS NOT NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR UP_BRC = BRC ) A START WITH HOFC_BIZO_DSC = '01' CONNECT BY PRIOR BRC = UP_BRC ORDER SIBLINGS BY BRC

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, A.BSN_PRSNM, A.BSN_PRSS_C, A.UP_BSN_PRSS_C, A.LV0_BSN_PRSS_C, A.LV1_BSN_PRSS_C, A.LV2_BSN_PRSS_C, A.LV3_BSN_PRSS_C, A.LV4_BSN_PRSS_C, A.LV0_BSN_PRSNM, A.LV1_BSN_PRSNM, A.LV2_BSN_PRSNM, A.LV3_BSN_PRSNM, A.LV4_BSN_PRSNM, A.LV0_ENG_BSN_PRSNM, A.LV1_ENG_BSN_PRSNM, A.LV2_ENG_BSN_PRSNM, A.LV3_ENG_BSN_PRSNM, A.LV4_ENG_BSN_PRSNM, LEVEL-1 AS "LEVEL", CASE WHEN C.BSN_PRSS_C IS NULL AND D.BSN_PRSS_C IS NULL AND E.BSN_PRSS_C IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END, A.VLD_YN, CONNECT_BY_ISLEAF AS LEAF FROM ( SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, CASE WHEN A.VLD_YN = 'Y' THEN A.BSN_PRSNM WHEN A.VLD_YN = 'N' THEN CONCAT('삭제)',A.BSN_PRSNM) END AS BSN_PRSNM, A.BSN_PRSS_C, A.UP_BSN_PRSS_C, A.LVL_NO, A.VLD_YN, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.BSN_PRSS_C, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,2) LV0_BSN_PRSS_C, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.BSN_PRSS_C, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,3) LV1_BSN_PRSS_C, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.BSN_PRSS_C, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,4) LV2_BSN_PRSS_C, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.BSN_PRSS_C, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,5) LV3_BSN_PRSS_C, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.BSN_PRSS_C, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,6) LV4_BSN_PRSS_C, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.BSN_PRSNM, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,2) LV0_BSN_PRSNM, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.BSN_PRSNM, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,3) LV1_BSN_PRSNM, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.BSN_PRSNM, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,4) LV2_BSN_PRSNM, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.BSN_PRSNM, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,5) LV3_BSN_PRSNM, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.BSN_PRSNM, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,6) LV4_BSN_PRSNM, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.ENG_BSN_PRSNM, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,2) LV0_ENG_BSN_PRSNM, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.ENG_BSN_PRSNM, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,3) LV1_ENG_BSN_PRSNM, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.ENG_BSN_PRSNM, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,4) LV2_ENG_BSN_PRSNM, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.ENG_BSN_PRSNM, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,5) LV3_ENG_BSN_PRSNM, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.ENG_BSN_PRSNM, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,6) LV4_ENG_BSN_PRSNM FROM (SELECT * FROM TB_OR_OC_PRSS WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) ) A START WITH A.UP_BSN_PRSS_C IS NULL CONNECT BY A.UP_BSN_PRSS_C = PRIOR A.BSN_PRSS_C ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, A.BSN_PRSS_C FROM TB_OR_RM_RKP A WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) GROUP BY A.GRP_ORG_C, A.BSN_PRSS_C ) C ON A.GRP_ORG_C = C.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LV4_BSN_PRSS_C = C.BSN_PRSS_C LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, A.BSN_PRSS_C FROM TB_OR_RM_RKP A ,TB_OR_RH_REL_LSS B WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) GROUP BY A.GRP_ORG_C, A.BSN_PRSS_C ) D ON A.GRP_ORG_C = D.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LV4_BSN_PRSS_C = D.BSN_PRSS_C LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, A.BSN_PRSS_C FROM TB_OR_RM_RKP A ,TB_OR_RH_REL_KRI B WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND A.OPRK_RKP_ID = B.OPRK_RKP_ID GROUP BY A.GRP_ORG_C, A.BSN_PRSS_C ) E ON A.GRP_ORG_C = D.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LV4_BSN_PRSS_C = D.BSN_PRSS_C WHERE A.LV4_BSN_PRSS_C IS NOT NULL START WITH A.UP_BSN_PRSS_C IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR A.BSN_PRSS_C = A.UP_BSN_PRSS_C ORDER SIBLINGS BY A.BSN_PRSS_C

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, A.BSN_PRSNM, A.BSN_PRSS_C, A.UP_BSN_PRSS_C, A.LV0_BSN_PRSS_C, A.LV1_BSN_PRSS_C, A.LV2_BSN_PRSS_C, A.LV3_BSN_PRSS_C, A.LV4_BSN_PRSS_C, A.LV0_BSN_PRSNM, A.LV1_BSN_PRSNM, A.LV2_BSN_PRSNM, A.LV3_BSN_PRSNM, A.LV4_BSN_PRSNM, A.LV0_ENG_BSN_PRSNM, A.LV1_ENG_BSN_PRSNM, A.LV2_ENG_BSN_PRSNM, A.LV3_ENG_BSN_PRSNM, A.LV4_ENG_BSN_PRSNM, LEVEL-1 AS "LEVEL", CASE WHEN C.BSN_PRSS_C IS NULL AND D.BSN_PRSS_C IS NULL AND E.BSN_PRSS_C IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END, A.VLD_YN, CONNECT_BY_ISLEAF AS LEAF FROM ( SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, CASE WHEN A.VLD_YN = 'Y' THEN A.BSN_PRSNM WHEN A.VLD_YN REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.BSN_PRSS_C, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,3) LV1_BSN_PRSS_C, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.BSN_PRSS_C, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,4) LV2_BSN_PRSS_C, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.BSN_PRSS_C, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,5) LV3_BSN_PRSS_C, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.BSN_PRSS_C, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,6) LV4_BSN_PRSS_C, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.BSN_PRSNM, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,2) LV0_BSN_PRSNM, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.BSN_PRSNM, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,3) LV1_BSN_PRSNM, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.BSN_PRSNM, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,4) LV2_BSN_PRSNM, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.BSN_PRSNM, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,5) LV3_BSN_PRSNM, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.BSN_PRSNM, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,6) LV4_BSN_PRSNM, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.ENG_BSN_PRSNM, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,2) LV0_ENG_BSN_PRSNM, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.ENG_BSN_PRSNM, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,3) LV1_ENG_BSN_PRSNM, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.ENG_BSN_PRSNM, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,4) LV2_ENG_BSN_PRSNM, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.ENG_BSN_PRSNM, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,5) LV3_ENG_BSN_PRSNM, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.ENG_BSN_PRSNM, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,6) LV4_ENG_BSN_PRSNM FROM (SELECT * FROM TB_OR_OC_PRSS WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) ) A START WITH A.UP_BSN_PRSS_C IS NULL CONNECT BY A.UP_BSN_PRSS_C = PRIOR A.BSN_PRSS_C ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, A.BSN_PRSS_C FROM TB_OR_RM_RKP A WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) GROUP BY A.GRP_ORG_C, A.BSN_PRSS_C ) C ON A.GRP_ORG_C = C.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LV4_BSN_PRSS_C = C.BSN_PRSS_C LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, A.BSN_PRSS_C FROM TB_OR_RM_RKP A ,TB_OR_RH_REL_LSS B WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) GROUP BY A.GRP_ORG_C, A.BSN_PRSS_C ) D ON A.GRP_ORG_C = D.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LV4_BSN_PRSS_C = D.BSN_PRSS_C LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, A.BSN_PRSS_C FROM TB_OR_RM_RKP A ,TB_OR_RH_REL_KRI B WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND A.OPRK_RKP_ID = B.OPRK_RKP_ID GROUP BY A.GRP_ORG_C, A.BSN_PRSS_C ) E ON A.GRP_ORG_C = D.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LV4_BSN_PRSS_C = D.BSN_PRSS_C WHERE A.BSN_PRSS_C IN (SELECT BSN_PRSS_C FROM TB_OR_OH_PRSS_UGBR WHERE BRC = TRIM(#sch_brc#)) START WITH A.UP_BSN_PRSS_C IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR A.BSN_PRSS_C = A.UP_BSN_PRSS_C ORDER SIBLINGS BY A.BSN_PRSS_C

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: SELECT C.BRNM, A.BRNM AS TEAM_CNM, A.BRC FROM( SELECT GRP_ORG_C , BRC , BRNM , UP_BRC , LVL_NO , BR_LKO_YN , NVL(RGN_C, '') AS RGN_C , HOFC_BIZO_DSC , NVL(LWST_ORGZ_YN, 'N') AS LWST_ORGZ_YN , NVL(UYN, 'N') AS UYN , TEMGR_DCZ_YN FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT * FROM TB_OR_OM_ORGZ WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) START WITH HOFC_BIZO_DSC IS NOT NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR UP_BRC = BRC )A START WITH HOFC_BIZO_DSC = '01' CONNECT BY PRIOR BRC = UP_BRC ORDER SIBLINGS BY BRC ) A INNER JOIN TB_OR_OH_PRSS_UGBR B ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C AND A.BRC = B.BRC AND B.BSN_PRSS_C = TRIM(#sch_bsn_prss_c#) LEFT JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ C ON A.GRP_ORG_C = C.GRP_ORG_C AND A.UP_BRC = C.BRC

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: DELETE FROM TB_OR_OH_PRSS_UGBR WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND BSN_PRSS_C = TRIM(#sch_bsn_prss_c#) AND BRC = TRIM(#sch_brc#)

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: DELETE FROM TB_OR_OH_PRSS_UGBR WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND BSN_PRSS_C = TRIM(#sch_bsn_prss_c#) AND BRC = TRIM(#sch_team_cd#)

sql.name: SQL12
sql.data: INSERT INTO TB_OR_OH_PRSS_UGBR ( GRP_ORG_C, BSN_PRSS_C, BRC , FIR_INP_DTM, FIR_INPMN_ENO, LSCHG_DTM, LS_WKR_ENO ) VALUES ( TRIM(#grp_org_c#), TRIM(#sch_bsn_prss_c#), TRIM(#brc#) , SYSDATE, TRIM(#userid#), SYSDATE, TRIM(#userid#) )

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, A.BSN_PRSNM, A.BSN_PRSS_C, A.UP_BSN_PRSS_C, A.LV0_BSN_PRSS_C, A.LV1_BSN_PRSS_C, A.LV2_BSN_PRSS_C, A.LV3_BSN_PRSS_C, A.LV4_BSN_PRSS_C, A.LV0_BSN_PRSNM, A.LV1_BSN_PRSNM, A.LV2_BSN_PRSNM, A.LV3_BSN_PRSNM, A.LV4_BSN_PRSNM, A.LV0_ENG_BSN_PRSNM, A.LV1_ENG_BSN_PRSNM, A.LV2_ENG_BSN_PRSNM, A.LV3_ENG_BSN_PRSNM, A.LV4_ENG_BSN_PRSNM, LEVEL-1 AS "LEVEL", CASE WHEN C.BSN_PRSS_C IS NULL AND D.BSN_PRSS_C IS NULL AND E.BSN_PRSS_C IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END, A.VLD_YN, CONNECT_BY_ISLEAF AS LEAF FROM ( SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, CASE WHEN A.VLD_YN = 'Y' THEN A.BSN_PRSNM WHEN A.VLD_YN = 'N' THEN CONCAT('삭제)',A.BSN_PRSNM) END AS BSN_PRSNM, A.BSN_PRSS_C, A.UP_BSN_PRSS_C, A.LVL_NO, A.VLD_YN, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.BSN_PRSS_C, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,2) LV0_BSN_PRSS_C, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.BSN_PRSS_C, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,3) LV1_BSN_PRSS_C, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.BSN_PRSS_C, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,4) LV2_BSN_PRSS_C, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.BSN_PRSS_C, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,5) LV3_BSN_PRSS_C, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.BSN_PRSS_C, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,6) LV4_BSN_PRSS_C, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.BSN_PRSNM, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,2) LV0_BSN_PRSNM, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.BSN_PRSNM, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,3) LV1_BSN_PRSNM, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.BSN_PRSNM, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,4) LV2_BSN_PRSNM, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.BSN_PRSNM, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,5) LV3_BSN_PRSNM, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.BSN_PRSNM, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,6) LV4_BSN_PRSNM, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.ENG_BSN_PRSNM, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,2) LV0_ENG_BSN_PRSNM, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.ENG_BSN_PRSNM, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,3) LV1_ENG_BSN_PRSNM, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.ENG_BSN_PRSNM, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,4) LV2_ENG_BSN_PRSNM, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.ENG_BSN_PRSNM, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,5) LV3_ENG_BSN_PRSNM, REGEXP_SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(A.ENG_BSN_PRSNM, ' >'),'[^>]+',1,6) LV4_ENG_BSN_PRSNM FROM (SELECT * FROM TB_OR_OC_PRSS WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) ) A START WITH A.UP_BSN_PRSS_C IS NULL CONNECT BY A.UP_BSN_PRSS_C = PRIOR A.BSN_PRSS_C ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, A.BSN_PRSS_C FROM TB_OR_RM_RKP A WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) GROUP BY A.GRP_ORG_C, A.BSN_PRSS_C ) C ON A.GRP_ORG_C = C.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LV4_BSN_PRSS_C = C.BSN_PRSS_C LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, A.BSN_PRSS_C FROM TB_OR_RM_RKP A ,TB_OR_RH_REL_LSS B WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) GROUP BY A.GRP_ORG_C, A.BSN_PRSS_C ) D ON A.GRP_ORG_C = D.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LV4_BSN_PRSS_C = D.BSN_PRSS_C LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C, A.BSN_PRSS_C FROM TB_OR_RM_RKP A ,TB_OR_RH_REL_KRI B WHERE A.GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) AND A.OPRK_RKP_ID = B.OPRK_RKP_ID GROUP BY A.GRP_ORG_C, A.BSN_PRSS_C ) E ON A.GRP_ORG_C = D.GRP_ORG_C AND A.LV4_BSN_PRSS_C = D.BSN_PRSS_C WHERE A.LV4_BSN_PRSS_C IS NOT NULL START WITH A.UP_BSN_PRSS_C IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR A.BSN_PRSS_C = A.UP_BSN_PRSS_C ORDER SIBLINGS BY A.BSN_PRSS_C

sql.name: SQL11
sql.data: SELECT A.GRP_ORG_C , A.BRC , C.BRNM H_BRNM , B.BRNM UP_BRNM , A.BRNM FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT * FROM TB_OR_OM_ORGZ WHERE GRP_ORG_C = TRIM(#grp_org_c#) START WITH HOFC_BIZO_DSC IS NOT NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR UP_BRC = BRC ) A LEFT JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ B ON A.GRP_ORG_C = B.GRP_ORG_C AND A.UP_BRC = B.BRC LEFT JOIN TB_OR_OM_ORGZ C ON A.GRP_ORG_C = C.GRP_ORG_C AND B.UP_BRC = C.BRC WHERE LEVEL = 4 START WITH A.HOFC_BIZO_DSC = '01' CONNECT BY PRIOR A.BRC = A.UP_BRC ORDER SIBLINGS BY A.BRC

sql.name: SQL12
sql.data: INSERT INTO TB_OR_OH_PRSS_UGBR ( GRP_ORG_C, BSN_PRSS_C, BRC , FIR_INP_DTM, FIR_INPMN_ENO, LSCHG_DTM, LS_WKR_ENO ) VALUES ( TRIM(#grp_org_c#), TRIM(#sch_bsn_prss_c#), TRIM(#sch_brc#) , SYSDATE, TRIM(#userid#), SYSDATE, TRIM(#userid#) )
